dict.key: If the barmoter falls, then it will rain or it will snow.
dict.string: the barometer falls; it will rains; it will snow
dict.key: When the sun shines today, it won‘t shine tommorrow.
dict.string: the sun shines today; it will shine tommorow
dict.key: Robert was jealous of Yvonne, or he was not in a good mood.
dict.string: Robert was jealous of Yvonne; he was in a good mood
dict.key: If interest rates go up, share prices go down.
dict.string: interest rates go up; share prices go down
dict.key: No shoes, no shirt, no service
If Dick met Jane yesterday, they had a cup of coffee together or they took a walk in the park
dict.string: Dick met Jane yesterday; they had a cup of coffee together; they took a walk in the park
dict.key: Today it will rain or shine, but not both;
If Smith has installed central heating, then he has sold his car or he has not paid his mortage
dict.string: Smith has installed central heating; he has sold his car; he has not paid his mortage
